pages.text: $(li)The Bricks can be used to craft Flower Pots, Planters, Bricks and Honey Pots.$(br)$(li)You can throw them to your enemies right clicking while you have a Brick in your hand.$(br)$(li)They will inflict half of heart of damage and will push your enemies away too.

$(li)You can obtain Bricks smelting Clay in a Furnace, Baking or Kiln.$(br)$(li)Masons will trade this item in exchange of Emerals too.$(br)$(li)Their throw range is in the middle compared with the Nether Brick (Lowest) and Mud Brick (Largest).
